thread.title: Patrick Waters
thread.title_full: Nevada Corporate Headquarters, Inc. reviewed by Patrick Waters

author: Patrick Waters
title: Patrick Waters
text: My wife and I worked with Steven from NCH to rollover my wife's 401K to a solo K account with NCH. Steven was very knowledgeable about the process and had everything prepared before our phone call with him. Everything went very smoothly when we were connected with my wife's current 401K provider. We were on the phone less than 30 minutes. Steven emailed the document to my wife in less than an hour.
